医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
突破性研究揭示电离辐射对细胞 DNA 的影响最近日本福岛核灾难排放的废水引发了人们对辐射暴露对健康影响的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Breakthrough-research-unveils-effects-of-ionizing-radiation-on-cellular-DNA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Breakthrough-research-unveils-effects-of-ionizing-radiation-on-cellular-DNA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ca2ec3a-dde1-43eb-96a7-a871d95e9de0 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:46:00 -0500 Breakthrough research unveils effects of ionizing radiation on cellular DNA
抗菌漱口水可减少糖尿病患者的牙周炎细菌除了口臭之外，越来越多的证据表明，口腔持续炎症（如牙龈疾病）与阿尔茨海默病或 2 型糖尿病等严重疾病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Antiseptic-mouthwash-reduces-periodontitis-bacteria-in-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Antiseptic-mouthwash-reduces-periodontitis-bacteria-in-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76e6ce2c-7dc7-44bb-bad1-2475a6768a6e Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:29:10 -0500 Antiseptic mouthwash reduces periodontitis bacteria in diabetes patients
价值 2000 万美元的突破性 OCT 项目旨在彻底改变眼部健康筛查在美国，超过四分之一的 40 岁以上成年人患有眼部疾病，包括青光眼、白内障或年龄相关性黄斑变性，或影响眼睛的慢性健康状况，例如糖尿病性视网膜病变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Breakthrough-2420-million-OCT-project-aims-to-revolutionize-eye-health-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Breakthrough-2420-million-OCT-project-aims-to-revolutionize-eye-health-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2f31847-80b8-4886-b0c9-9758dbc02ead Wed, 14 Feb 2024 11:17:32 -0500 Breakthrough $20 million OCT project aims to revolutionize eye health screening
研究揭示女性生殖因素与慢性阻塞性肺病风险之间的联系《Thorax》在线发表的研究发现，一系列生殖因素，包括月经初潮年龄和提前绝经，都与慢性阻塞性肺病（导致呼吸困难的进行性肺部疾病的总称）风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Research-uncovers-link- Between-reproductive-factors-and-COPD-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Research-uncovers-link- Between-reproductive-factors-and-COPD-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47e06490-9313-451e-a22b-ca5ccbf02374 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 11:12:37 -0500 Research uncovers link between reproductive factors and COPD risk in women
新颖的“闪光和冷冻骨折”技术揭示了神经元通讯的秘密恐惧和成瘾对社会产生重大影响。管理它们通常具有挑战性，因为它们是由我们大脑中复杂的神经元回路驱动的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Novel-Flash-and-Freeze-fracture-technique-reveals-neuronal-communication-secrets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Novel-Flash-and-Freeze-fracture-technique-reveals-neuronal-communication-secrets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adac11c0-bf95-4ea8-933f-bcaef82aad74 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 11:07:47 -0500 Novel "Flash and Freeze-fracture" technique reveals neuronal communication secrets
石榴皮和石榴籽提取物具有抗高血压特性从石榴非食用部分提取的提取物的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Extract-from-pomegranate-peels-and-seeds-shows-anti-hypertential-properties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Extract-from-pomegranate-peels-and-seeds-shows-anti-hypertential-properties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84969eac-0fc3-4944-8ecc-90cc39f7ab99 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 10:26:00 -0500 Extract from pomegranate peels and seeds shows anti-hypertensive properties
对于自闭症谱系障碍患者来说，机器人比人类更容易互动吗？患有自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 的人是否发现与机器人伙伴互动比与人类伙伴互动更容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Are-robots-easier-to-interact-with-than- humans-for-people-with-Autism-Spectrum-Disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Are-robots-easier-to-interact-with-than- humans-for-people-with-Autism-Spectrum-Disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f1b5490-570f-4761-bfa9-bb703d63e3ef Wed, 14 Feb 2024 09:49:00 -0500 Are robots easier to interact with than humans for people with Autism Spectrum Disorder?
充满液体的肺囊被发现是病毒吞噬细胞的中心长期以来，科学家们一直认为我们肺部周围充满液体的囊只是抵御外部损伤的缓冲垫。事实证明，它还含有强效的病毒吞噬细胞，这些细胞在流感感染期间会冲入肺部。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Fluid-filled-lung-sac-found-to-be-the-hub-for-virus-eating-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Fluid-filled-lung-sac-found-to-be-the-hub-for-virus-eating-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1d34142-3906-450d-832e-83c5b2b1372c Wed, 14 Feb 2024 09:25:03 -0500 Fluid-filled lung sac found to be the hub for virus-eating cells
胰腺癌研究的新突破可能有助于减缓该疾病的致命传播冷泉港实验室 (CSHL) 和加州大学戴维斯分校的科学家经过八年的努力，在胰腺癌研究方面取得了新的突破。它可能有助于减缓这种疾病的致命传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/New-breakthrough-in-pancreatic-cancer-research-could-help-slow-the-diseases-deadly-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/New-breakthrough-in-pancreatic-cancer-research-could-help-slow-the-diseases-deadly-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=497ce95c-dda6-4fcf-b666-9965dfe42cfd Wed, 14 Feb 2024 09:11:10 -0500 New breakthrough in pancreatic cancer research could help slow the disease's deadly spread
童年创伤与情绪识别之间的关联童年创伤与情绪识别准确性（ERA）的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Associations- Between-childhood-trauma-and-emotion-recognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Associations- Between-childhood-trauma-and-emotion-recognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09528396-a5da-4a30-8c6e-f276d033515b Wed, 14 Feb 2024 08:35:00 -0500 Associations between childhood trauma and emotion recognition
